briefTitle: Study Comparing Daclatasvir (BMS-790052) With Telaprevir Combined With Peginterferon Alfa-2a and Ribavirin in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Key Inclusion Criteria:

* Participants chronically infected with hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 1a or 1b
* HCV RNA viral load ≥10,000 IU/mL
* No prior treatment including but not limited to interferon, ribavirin, and direct-acting antivirals
* No history of cirrhosis liver biopsy within 3 years or Fibroscan® within 1 year
* Body mass index of 18 to 35 kg/m\^2
* Negative for HIV and hepatitis B virus

Key Exclusion Criteria:

* Evidence of decompensated liver disease
* Evidence of medical condition other than HCV contributing to chronic liver disease

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Genotype 1b Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 12 (SVR12)
outcomeMeasures.description: SVR12 was defined as hepatitis C virus RNA levels to be lower than the limit of quantitation, ie, 25 IU/mL target detected or target not detected at follow-up Week 12.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Genotype 1b Participants With Rapid Virologic Response (RVR) at Week 4
outcomeMeasures.description: RVR was defined as hepatitis c virus RNA levels lower than lower limit of quantitation, ie, 25 IU/mL target not detected at Week 4 of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Genotype 1b Participants With Extended Rapid Virologic Response (eRVR) at Both Week 4 and Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: eRVR was defined as hepatitis C virus RNA levels lower than the lower limit of quantitation, ie, 25 IU/mL target not detected at both Weeks 4 and 12 of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Genotype 1b Participants With Complete Early Virologic Response (cEVR)
outcomeMeasures.description: cEVR was defined as hepatitis C virus RNA levels lower than the lower limit of quantitation, ie, 25 IU/mL target not detected at Week 12 of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Genotype 1b Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 24 (SVR24)
outcomeMeasures.description: SVR24 was defined as hepatitis C virus RNA levels lower than the lower limit of quantitation, ie, 25 IU/mL target detected or target not detected at follow-up week 24 of treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Genotype 1a Participants With Sustained Virologic Response at Follow-up Week 12 (SVR12)
outcomeMeasures.description: SVR12 was defined as hepatitis C virus RNA levels lower than the lower limit of quantitation, ie, 25 IU/mL target detected or target not detected at follow-up week 12 of treatment.
